title: Complete Project Egoist Styles Tier List and Guide
description: A game where Kaiser isn't a one trick pony.
author: Gordan Perisic
excerpt: A game where Kaiser isn't a one trick pony.
text: Image by The Escapist A game where Kaiser isn't a one trick pony. | Published: Apr 30, 2025 07:59 am Project Egoist Roblox takes on the Blue Lock Rivals format and brings some unique changes to popular styles. Mainly, styles that are strong or weak in other BLR games like Azure Latch may be opposite in this game. Check out my Project Egoist styles tier list for a detailed run-down of the best styles. Table of contentsAll Project Egoist Styles RankedS Tier Project Egoist StylesA Tier Project Egoist StylesB Tier Project Egoist Styles All Project Egoist Styles Ranked Image by The Escapist No Project Egoist style is terrible so I had no C or D-Tier but there is definitely a noticeable difference between S and B-Tier when talking offense. S are currently the most powerful OP styles. A-Tier is where a style is great but either lacks raw power for S or has one move that’s holding it back. Finally, B-Tier is a strong style that isn’t as OP or requires much more skill and specific match-ups to shine. Check out my reasoning below like for Nagi where I really think he shines more in defense for higher tiers. S Tier Project Egoist Styles Kaiser Style & MovesRanking ExplanationsKaiser (Legendary – 2.5%)Overall this is objectively the best offensive style in the game currently due to an array of extremely powerful shots, the best mobility move, and a strong defensive counter in Flow. Check out each move below.Magnus ShotFire off a curved shot where the curve goes in the direction you’re currently moving with great range and power.Incredibly difficult to block due to the steep curve and amazing speed and power.Kaiser ImpactA longer-range, faster, and overall objectively more powerful version of Isagi’s Direct Shot.Kaiser Impact: Strike (Awakening/Flow Variant)An even faster and even longer range power shot. Ends your Flow Awakening meaning you cannot use Beinschuss and this in the same Flow.Great for offense due to its power and range and it’s pretty decent for passing too.BlitzA hyper fast series of dashes forward with iFrames and Dribble active.You can use this for straight mobility but it’s better used to dribble with it or you can pop it after an R dash for even longer distance covered. The best dash in the game.Kaiser Impact Beinschuss (Awakening/Flow Only)Perform a powerful Counter shot with iFrames that counters any opponent steals.Your go to defensive Counter when you’re getting ganked by people and the range and power are similar to Azure Latch. A Tier Project Egoist Styles Sae Style & MovesRanking ExplanationsSae (Legendary – 2.5%)While I don’t like how the Perfect Pass works in Project Egoist, Sae is still a powerhouse due to difficult-to-block curved shots and excellent mobility and dribbling.Curve ShotFire off an extremely fast curved shot with a steep curve and medium range.Difficult to block and has a really quick firing off animation so it’s a bit more difficult to steal the ball. This is also a great move for passing.Magic TurnA Twice-use curved dash that has iFrame/Dribble active.Probably the second-best mobility move in the game after Kaiser’s dash.Perfect PassA fast pass towards your team-mate but it doesn’t auto-give them the ball.You have to aim it toward your team-mate like in BLR and Azure Latch but unlike those games it just pass the ball close to their position, it doesn’t auto-give them the ball.Cross Elastico (Awakening/Flow Only)Activate to bypass an opponent and shoot a high-speed power shot with half-court range.A bit difficult to aim but otherwise an extremely powerful half-court shot. Isagi Style & MovesRanking ExplanationsIsagi (Rare – 65%)Despite being a rare Isagi is actually a pretty great style since he comes with decent power shots and a mobility move for extra Dribble and distance.Back Heel ShotShuffle the ball and then fire off a medium power, medium range shot.Great for messing up the timing of opponents and can be used decently as a pass as well.Off-Ball MovementA quick dash forward that can be used for mobility and dribbling.Just an all-around useful dash move for creating distance.Direct ShotShoot a ball with medium range but great power and speed.The classic shot that’s best used by baiting the goalkeeper to one side and shooting to the opposite side.Blind Spot Direct Shot (Awakening/Flow Only)An iFrame and more powerful version of Direct ShotMake sure to aim it well first and then you shoot one of the most powerful shots in the game. B Tier Project Egoist Styles Nagi Style & MovesRanking ExplanationsNagi (Epic – 32.5%)Don’t get me wrong, Nagi is excellent since he can block Kaiser’s long range shots with Control and has great defenses with his Flow Counter variant. He’s just not the best offensive style and lacks a mobility move to kite and create distance.Jumping TurnA quick jump and shoot shot with low range but decent power if you’re close.Use it within the square/half circle lines area of the goal for it to go in. Otherwise it won’t reach the goal.ControlIf there’s a ball nearby mid-air jump and steal it.Probably Nagi’s best move since you can catch balls that the goalkeeper shoots but also block/catch long-range shots from Kaiser and other long-range styles.Fake VolleyDo a fake shot that has iFrames and Dribble so that you ankle break opponents who try to steal.This is an excellent defensive tool when your Dribble is on cooldown so that you can stun opponents.Ultimate Lift Tap (Awakening/Flow Only)Perform a powerful shot with almost half court range.Ultimate Lift Tap Counter Variant (Awakening/Flow Only)Activate when someone tries to steal your ball to counter them and fire off an even more powerful shot.Your go to Counter that I would almost always use as a variant unless you’re alone and just want to use it as a free goal. That’s it for my Project Egoist styles tier list. Check out our Project Egoist codes for free cash to roll styles with. The Escapist is supported by our audience. html:
Image by The Escapist

A game where Kaiser isn't a one trick pony.

|

Published: Apr 30, 2025 07:59 am

Project Egoist Roblox takes on the Blue Lock Rivals format and brings some unique changes to popular styles. Mainly, styles that are strong or weak in other BLR games like Azure Latch may be opposite in this game. Check out my Project Egoist styles tier list for a detailed run-down of the best styles.

Table of contents

  • All Project Egoist Styles Ranked
    • S Tier Project Egoist Styles
    • A Tier Project Egoist Styles
    • B Tier Project Egoist Styles

All Project Egoist Styles Ranked

No Project Egoist style is terrible so I had no C or D-Tier but there is definitely a noticeable difference between S and B-Tier when talking offense. S are currently the most powerful OP styles. A-Tier is where a style is great but either lacks raw power for S or has one move that’s holding it back. Finally, B-Tier is a strong style that isn’t as OP or requires much more skill and specific match-ups to shine. Check out my reasoning below like for Nagi where I really think he shines more in defense for higher tiers.

S Tier Project Egoist Styles

Kaiser

A Tier Project Egoist Styles

Sae

Isagi

B Tier Project Egoist Styles

Nagi

That’s it for my Project Egoist styles tier list. Check out our Project Egoist codes for free cash to roll styles with.
